classitems.description: The identity of the widget.
classitems.name: ImageCropper.NAME
resize:start
classitems.description: Relay of the Resize utility event.

params.name: event
params.description:
An Event Facade object with the following specific property added:
<dl>
<dt>resizeEvent</dt><dd>The Event Facade object provided by the Resize utility.</dd>
</dl>

classitems.name: resize:resize
classitems.description: Relay of the Resize utility event.

params.name: event
params.description:
An Event Facade object with the following specific property added:
<dl>
<dt>resizeEvent</dt><dd>The Event Facade object provided by the Resize utility.</dd>
</dl>

classitems.name: resize:end
classitems.description: Relay of the Resize utility event.

params.name: event
params.description:
An Event Facade object with the following specific property added:
<dl>
<dt>resizeEvent</dt><dd>The Event Facade object provided by the Resize utility.</dd>
</dl>

classitems.name: drag:start
classitems.description: Relay of the Drag utility event.

params.name: event
params.description:
An Event Facade object with the following specific property added:
<dl>
<dt>drag</dt><dd>The Event Facade object provided by the Drag utility.</dd>
</dl>

classitems.name: drag:resize
classitems.description: Relay of the Drag utility event.

params.name: event
params.description:
An Event Facade object with the following specific property added:
<dl>
<dt>drag</dt><dd>The Event Facade object provided by the Drag utility.</dd>
</dl>

classitems.name: drag:end
classitems.description: Relay of the Drag utility event.

params.name: event
params.description:
An Event Facade object with the following specific property added:
<dl>
<dt>drag</dt><dd>The Event Facade object provided by the Drag utility.</dd>

classitems.name: crop:start
classitems.description: Fires at the start of a crop operation. Unifies drag:start and and resize:start.

params.name: event
params.description:
An Event Facade object with the following specific property added:
<dl>
<dt>left</dt><dd>The current X position of the crop area relative to the base image.</dd>
<dt>top</dt><dd>The current Y position of the crop area relative to the base image.</dd>
<dt>width</dt><dd>The new width of the crop area.</dd>
<dt>height</dt><dd>The new height of the crop area.</dd>
</dl>

classitems.name: crop:crop
classitems.description: Fires every time the crop area changes. Unifies drag:drag and resize:resize.

params.name: event
params.description:
An Event Facade object with the following specific property added:
<dl>
<dt>left</dt><dd>The current X position of the crop area relative to the base image.</dd>
<dt>top</dt><dd>The current Y position of the crop area relative to the base image.</dd>
<dt>width</dt><dd>The new width of the crop area.</dd>
<dt>height</dt><dd>The new height of the crop area.</dd>
</dl>

classitems.name: crop:end
classitems.description: Fires at the end of a crop operation. Unifies drag:end and resize:end.

params.name: event
params.description:
An Event Facade object with the following specific property added:
<dl>
<dt>left</dt><dd>The current X position of the crop area relative to the base image.</dd>
<dt>top</dt><dd>The current Y position of the crop area relative to the base image.</dd>
<dt>width</dt><dd>The new width of the crop area.</dd>
<dt>height</dt><dd>The new height of the crop area.</dd>
</dl>

classitems.description: Returns the coordinates needed to crop the image
classitems.name: getCropCoords

return.description: The top, left, height, width and image url of the image being cropped

classitems.description: Resets the crop element back to it's original position
classitems.name: reset

classitems.description: Template that will contain the ImageCropper's mask.
classitems.name: ImageCropper.CROP_MASK_TEMPLATE

classitems.description: Template that will contain the ImageCropper's resize node.
classitems.name: ImageCropper.RESIZE_KNOB_TEMPLATE

classitems.description: Template that will contain the ImageCropper's resize mask.
classitems.name: ImageCropper.RESIZE_MASK_TEMPLATE

classitems.description: Array of events to relay from the Resize utility to the ImageCropper
classitems.name: ImageCropper.RESIZE_EVENTS

classitems.description: Array of attributes to relay from the ImageCropper to the Resize utility
classitems.name: ImageCropper.RESIZE_ATTRS

classitems.description: Array of events to relay from the Drag utility to the ImageCropper
classitems.name: ImageCropper.DRAG_EVENTS

classitems.description:
Static property used to define the default attribute configuration of
the Widget.
classitems.name: ImageCropper.ATTRS

classitems.description: The source attribute of the image we are cropping
classitems.name: source

classitems.description: The resize mask used to highlight the crop area
classitems.name: resizeMask

classitems.description: The resized element
classitems.name: resizeKnob

classitems.description: Element used to shadow the part of the image we're not cropping
classitems.name: cropMask

classitems.description: Array of the XY position that we need to set the crop element to when we build it
classitems.name: initialXY

classitems.description: The pixel tick for the arrow keys
classitems.name: keyTick

classitems.description: The pixel tick for shift + the arrow keys
classitems.name: shiftKeyTick

classitems.description: Should we use the Arrow keys to position the crop element
classitems.name: useKeys

classitems.description: Show the Resize and Drag utilities status
classitems.name: status

classitems.description: MinHeight of the crop area
classitems.name: minHeight

classitems.description: MinWidth of the crop area
classitems.name: minWidth

classitems.description: Set the preserveRatio config option of the Resize Utlility
classitems.name: preserveRatio

classitems.description: Set the initlal height of the crop area, defaults to minHeight
classitems.name: initHeight

classitems.description: Set the initlal width of the crop area, defaults to minWidth
classitems.name: initWidth
